testcase.name: Fileio File I/O Deleting a file Should delete a file
Fileio File I/O Reading from JSON file Should fail to read non-existent JSON file
Fileio File I/O Creating a file Should create a file without error
Fileio File I/O Reading a Plaintext file Should fail to read non-existent file all at once
Fileio File I/O Writing to file Should write a string to a file
Fileio File I/O Reading a Plaintext file Should read file line by line
Fileio File I/O Writing to file Should write a slice of strings to a file
Fileio File I/O Writing to file Should append a slice of bytes to a file
Fileio File I/O Reading from JSON file Should fail to read invalid JSON file
Fileio File I/O Reading a Plaintext file Should fail to read non-existent file line by line
Fileio File I/O Writing to file Should write a slice of bytes to a file
Fileio File I/O Writing to file Should append a slice of strings to a file
Fileio File I/O Fetching file details Should fail to fetch file details of non existing directory
Fileio File I/O Reading from JSON file Should read a valid JSON file
Fileio File I/O Fetching file details Should fetch file details
Fileio File I/O Creating a file Should fail to create file within non existent directory
Fileio File I/O Deleting a file Should fail to delete non-existent file
Fileio File I/O Writing to file Should append a string to a file
Fileio File I/O Reading a Plaintext file Should read file all at once
